title: It's been a few months
body:
It's been a few months since i have asked riot, they didnt reply. But here it is:
So, there is this bug which some how made the cooldown timer much quicker.
Normally, the teleport cooldown is 300 sec, but after i used teleport it started at 240.
When the timer is down, the icon lights up, but i cannot use it. It doesn't show words, all i can hear is the sound of me using it.
This doesn't only apply to teleport. It applys to every other summoner skills.
Particular Long CD skills ( The Ult for most champs ), even item uses ( Youmuus, BORK, ETC)

replies.body:
I repaired my client. Its still happening

I havnt reinstalled it yet
This is a bug, though it might only be affecting you. Have you tried repairing your client?
Reinstall your client. I don't get this so it can't be the client everyone else has because I am the part of the set of people known as everyone else.
Don't get mathematical up in here.
